text: Iso Sluijters (born 24 July 1990) is a Dutch handball player for NMC Górnik Zabrze and the Dutch national team.EHF profile He represented the Netherlands at the 2020 European Men's Handball Championship.2020 European Men's Handball Championship squad ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch male handball players Category:Expatriate handball players in Poland Category:Dutch expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Dutch expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Dutch expatriate sportspeople in Norway Category:Dutch expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:SDC San Antonio players Category:Liga ASOBAL players Category:Sportspeople from Eindhoven
title: Iso Sluijters
